modName: Kadaj - Final Fantasy AC Clothes and Hairstyle
summary: This mod adds Kadaj\'s clothing and hairstyle from Final Fantasy Advent Children.
descriptionHtml:
KadajFF7ACClothes&Hairstyle
by hardarg
v1.000

================================
[color=orange][b]D E S C R I P T I O N[/b][/color]
================================
[i[\"My Reunion... bet you\'re dying to watch.\"[/i] -[b]Kadaj[/b]

This mod adds Kadaj\'s Clothes and Hairstyle from Final Fantasy AC. It is obtainable via console, simply type:
[b]help kadaj 4[/b]
-Kadaj\'s Robes
-Kadaj\'s Boots

The armor is only for Males. [s]And can be crafted and tempered in your nearest forge.[/s]
The hairstyle is available to BOTH genders. To change hairstyle, type in console:
[b]showracemenu[/b]


================================
[color=orange][b]I N S T A L L A T I O N[/b][/color]
================================
Unfortunately, I do not use NMM,  Manual install will have to do.

1.) Extract data folder and .esp file in this archive to a temporary folder, preferably on the Desktop for easier access.
2.) Move hardargKadaj.esp file to extracted data folder.
3.) Copy the extracted data folder to your Skyrim directory.
4.) Launch Skyrim, enable hardargKadaj.esp in your data files.
5.) Play and Enjoy.


================================
[color=orange][b]U N I N S T A L L A T I O N[/b][/color]
================================
Delete hardargKadaj.esp from your Data folder.
Delete the folders named hardarg, in your meshes and textures folder.


================================
[color=orange][b]K N O W N  B U G S[/b][/color]
================================
If the game crashes when trying to equip the armor, download and try the fix provided.

 Please report any bugs, if found any.

================================
[color=orange][b]F . A . Q[/b][/color]
================================
Q: Why make Kadaj?
A: \'Twas a small side project requested by my bro, when I started working on Aerith.

Q: What about Yazoo and Loz? Or Sephiroth?
A: Since this was only done as a special request, and I\'m preoccupied at the moment, their fates are uncertain.

Q: Is this wearable for Beast races?
A: Sadly, no.

Q: Can you list what enchantments were applied to each clothing?
A: The robes and boots have no enchantment, however they are CRAFTABLE and TEMPERABLE.

Q: Can you convert it for female bodies as well?
A: As of the moment, I do not have the time to work on this. If you\'re up for it, feel free to do so. Just ask my permission beforehand. :)

Q:Is that all?!
A: I can\'t think of any at the moment, feel free to ask. :0)


================================
[color=orange][b]R E C O M M E N D[/b][/color]
================================
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30977]Aerith Clothes and Hairstyle[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31830]Cloud Clothes and Hairstyle[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33054]Zack Clothes and Hairstyle[/url]

================================
[color=orange][b]C R E D I T  &  S P E C I A L T H A N K S[/b][/color]
================================
[b]Bethesda[/b] - For Skyrim.

[b]Square[/b] - For creating the Final Fantasy series.
author: hardarg
